Posts.Content: I'm totally flippin out . Could this be breast cancer ?. I heard wearing a bra all the time can casue it and i were very supported bras and when i was taking a shower i noticed a lump in my breast. Not under my armpit but in my breast. I'm so scared could this happen to me at 16 . I don't feel comfortable without wearing a bra and my breast are kinda big so i were supported bras so they won't be big AND saggy .I'm really looking for some suggestions and would like some advice
Posts.Title: HELP I'm 16 and i just found a lump in my breast!!!!!!
